TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DragDrop extends System.Object
public ref class DragDrop abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于启动拖放操作的帮助器方法和字段（包括开始拖放操作的方法），并提供用于添加和移除拖放相关事件处理程序的工具。

span.span: Provides helper methods and fields for initiating drag-and-drop operations, including a method to begin a drag-and-drop operation, and facilities for adding and removing drag-and-drop related event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放通常指一种数据传输方法：使用鼠标（或一些其他指针设备）选择一个或多个对象，将其拖至 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中的某些所需拖放目标之上并放置。Drag-and-drop commonly refers to a method of data transfer that involves using a mouse (or some other pointing device) to select one or more objects, dragging these objects over some desired drop target in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], and dropping them. 拖放操作相当于副本 （或剪切）-和-粘贴操作，可将数据从一个对象或应用程序到另一个传输。A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy (or cut)-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data from one object or application to another. 拖放操作通常涉及两个参与方： 拖动源中的拖动的数据源自和放置目标接收放置的数据。Drag-and-drop operations typically involve two parties: a drag source from which the dragged data originates and a drop target which receives the dropped data. 拖放操作所需的事件和方法是在 类中定义的。The events and methods required for drag-and-drop operations are defined in the class. 拖放事件是可以附加到任何的附加的事件或。The drag-and-drop events are attached events that can be attached to any or . 拖动源和放置目标可能是在同一个应用程序或不同应用程序的 UI 元素。The drag source and drop target may be UI elements in the same application or in different applications. 但是，拖放目标必须知道如何处理拖动源所传递的数据。However, the drop target must know how to process the data being passed by the drag source. > [!NOTE] > 和类包含的拖放事件的别名，因此，这些类作为基类继承时，事件将出现在类成员列表中。The and classes contain aliases for the drag-and-drop events so that the events appear in the class members list when these classes are inherited as a base class. 当事件处理程序附加到其中一个类上的拖放事件时，该处理程序附加到基础事件和它们接收事件数据的同一个实例。When you attach an event handler to a drag-and-drop event on one of these classes, the handler is attached to the underlying event and they receive the same instance of event data. 有关示例，请参阅 。For example, see . 拖动源通过调用静态 方法和向其传递传输的数据来启动拖放操作。The drag source initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 元素通常会处理拖动源时的以下事件：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drag source: - - 元素通常会处理以下事件时放置目标：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drop target: - - - - 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[拖放概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information and examples, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是你的应用程序以确定拖动的时间，然后启动拖放操作的责任。It is the responsibility of your application to determine when a drag occurs, and then initiate the drag-and-drop operation. 通常，这是何时和要拖动的元素上发生的事件序列。Typically, this is when a and sequence of events occurs over the element to be dragged. 通过调用静态启动拖放操作方法并向其传递传输的数据。You initiate the drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 如有必要， 方法将使 中的数据自动换行。The method will automatically wrap the data in a if necessary. 为了更好地控制数据格式，可将 中的数据换行，然后再将其传递至 方法。For greater control over the data format, you can wrap the data in a before passing it to the method. 从返回的值method 的值是中拖放目标的属性集事件处理程序。The value returned from the method is the value of the property set in the drop target's event handler. 如果返回值不匹配的一个`allowedEffects`调用中指定，则不执行拖放操作。If the return value does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to , the drag-and-drop operation is not performed. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了如何从 元素的 事件处理程序中启动拖放操作，以将其作为拖动源。The following example shows how to initiate a drag-and-drop operation from the event handler of an element to make it a drag source. 传输的数据是椭圆形的字符串表示形式属性。The transferred data is the string representation of the ellipse's property. 将数据传递给作为字符串的方法和自动包装在。The data is passed to the method as a string and is automatically wrapped in a . [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#dodragdrop)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#dodragdrop)]

summary.span: 当对象被拖入正作为放置目标元素边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged into the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次将对象拖入用作放置目标的元素的边界每次都会引发此事件。This event is raised once each time an object is dragged into the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target. 如果不会引发此事件的元素属性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 处理此事件是可选的拖放目标，并不是所有拖放方案所必需的。Handling this event is optional for the drop target, and is not necessary for all drag-and-drop scenarios. 通常，如果适用于你的应用程序，可处理此事件，以便提供拖放操作效果预览。You typically handle this event to provide a preview of the effects of the drag-and-drop operation, if appropriate for your application. 请勿设置 事件中的 属性，因为在 事件中该属性将被覆盖。Do not set the property in the event, as it will be overwritten in the event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 元素的 事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 此代码通过保存当前的 画笔预览拖放操作的效果。This code previews the effects of the drag-and-drop operation by saving the current brush. 它将检查以查看是否正在拖动的椭圆上方包含可以转换为字符串数据。It then checks to see if the being dragged over the ellipse contains string data that can be converted to a . 如果是，将 应用于椭圆。If so, the is applied to the ellipse. 在 事件处理程序中还原更改。The change is reverted in the event handler. 如果数据无法转换为 ，则不执行任何操作。If the data cannot be converted to a , no action is performed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次将对象拖出用作拖放目标而未放置的元素边界后，将引发此事件。This event is raised once each time an object is dragged out of the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target without being dropped. 如果不会引发此事件的元素属性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 您通常需要处理此事件，以便撤销在中所做的任何更改事件处理程序。You typically handle this event to undo any changes that you made in the event handler. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 元素的 事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 此代码通过将保存的 应用到椭圆来撤销 事件处理程序中执行的预览。This code undoes the preview performed in the event handler by applying the saved to the ellipse. summary.span: 当正作为放置目标的元素边界内的拖动对象时持续发生。

span.span: Occurs continuously while an object is dragged within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被拖动的对象是作为放置目标的元素的边界内时持续，则将引发此事件。This event is raised continuously while a dragged object is within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target. 如果不会引发此事件的元素属性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 事件配对使用拖动源上的事件。The event is paired with the event on the drag source. 在事件处理程序，您通常情况下检查传输的数据是拖放目标可以处理的格式。In the event handler, you typically check that the transferred data is in a format that the drop target can process. 您还可以检查任何修改键被按下，这通常指示用户想移动或复制操作。You can also check whether any modifier keys are pressed, which typically indicates whether the user intends a move or a copy action. 执行这些检查后，设置 属性以通知拖动源放置数据将产生的效果。After these checks are performed, you set the property to notify the drag source what effect dropping the data will have. 拖动源收到此信息属性的事件自变量，并且可以设置相应光标以向用户提供反馈。The drag source receives this information in the property of the event arguments, and can set an appropriate cursor to give feedback to the user. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 元素的 事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 此代码检查是否已将 拖动到包含可以转换为 的字符串数据的椭圆上方。This code checks to see if the being dragged over the ellipse contains string data that can be converted to a . 如果是，它会将 属性设置为 。If so, it sets the property to . 这将向拖动源指示可以将数据复制到椭圆。This indicates to the drag source that the data can be copied to the ellipse. 如果数据无法转换为 ，则将 属性设置为 。If the data cannot be converted to a , the property is set to . 这将向拖动源指示椭圆不是数据的有效拖放目标。This indicates to the drag source that the ellipse is not a valid drop target for the data. [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#DragOver](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#dragover)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#DragOver](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#dragover)]

span.span: Occurs when an object is dropped within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后作为放置目标的元素的边界内删除某一对象时引发事件。The event is raised once when an object is dropped within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target. 如果不会引发此事件的元素属性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 此事件结束拖放操作。This event ends the drag-and-drop operation. 在中事件处理程序，则提取传输的数据从并执行任何处理应用程序所需的数据。In the event handler, you extract the transferred data from the and perform any processing of the data that your application requires. 若要通知的下拉菜单，例如复制或移动，效果的拖动源设置中的属性事件处理程序。To notify the drag source of the effect of the drop, such as a copy or move, set the property in the event handler. 此属性的值是返回值的启动拖放操作的方法。The value of this property is the return value of the method that initiated the drag-and-drop operation. 如果返回的值不匹配的一个`allowedEffects`调用中指定，则不执行拖放操作。If the value that is returned does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to , the drag-and-drop operation is not performed. 初始值属性是与相同`allowedEffects`调用中指定方法。The initial value of the property is the same as the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to the method. 如果未设置属性，则返回此初始值，假定一个`allowedEffects`发生。If you do not set the property, this initial value is returned and it is assumed that one the `allowedEffects` occurred. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 元素的 事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 此代码应用拖放操作的效果。This code applies the effects of the drag-and-drop operation. 它会检查是否将 拖动到包含可以转换为 的字符串数据的椭圆上方。It checks to see if the being dragged over the ellipse contains string data that can be converted to a . 如果是，将 应用于椭圆。If so, the is applied to the ellipse. 如果数据无法转换为 ，则不执行任何操作。If the data cannot be converted to a , no action is performed. [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#Drop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#drop)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#Drop](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#drop)]

summary.span: 在拖放操作过程中持续发生，使拖动源可以向用户提供反馈。

span.span: Occurs continuously while a drag-and-drop operation is in progress, and enables the drag source to give feedback to the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对拖动源进行拖动时，持续引发 事件。The event is raised continuously while the drag source is being dragged. 此事件配对使用上拖放目标事件。This event is paired with the event on the drop target. 此事件的默认处理程序会检查拖动源是否在有效放置目标之上。The default handler for this event checks whether the drag source is over a valid drop target. 如果是，它会检查拖放目标的允许的效果。If it is, it checks the allowed effects of the drop target. 然后向最终用户提供有关允许的放置效果的反馈。It then gives feedback to the end user regarding the allowed drop effects. 通常通过将鼠标光标更改为非放置、复制或移动光标实现此操作。This is typically done by changing the mouse cursor to a no-drop, copy, or move cursor. 仅在需要使用自定义光标向用户提供反馈时处理此事件。You should only handle this event if you need to use custom cursors to provide feedback to the user. 如果您处理此事件，您必须将其标记为已处理以防止重写您的处理程序的默认行为。If you handle this event, you must mark it as handled to prevent the default behavior from overriding your handler. > [!CAUTION] > 在拖放操作期间持续引发此事件。This event is raised continuously during the drag-and-drop operation. 因此，应避免事件处理程序中的资源密集型任务。Therefore, you should avoid resource-intensive tasks in the event handler. 例如，每次引发 事件时，请使用缓存的光标，而不是创建新光标。For example, use a cached cursor instead of creating a new cursor each time the event is raised. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在拖动拖动源时，持续引发此事件。This event is raised continuously while the drag source is being dragged. 有关详细信息，请参阅 事件。For more information, see the event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier Field|| |路由策略Routing Strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的浮升事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is .

summary.span: 当拖放操作进行时持续发生，并使放置源依靠键/按钮状态取消拖放操作。

span.span: Occurs continuously while a drag-and-drop operation is in progress, and enables the drop source to end the drag-and-drop operation depending on the key/button states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对拖动源进行拖动时，持续引发 事件。The event is raised continuously while the drag source is being dragged. 你可以根据 ESC、SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 键以及鼠标按钮的状态处理此事件，以确定结束拖放操作的操作。You can handle this event to determine what action ends the drag-and-drop operation based on the state of the ESC, SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons. 此事件的默认处理程序在按下 ESC 键后取消拖放操作，并且在释放鼠标按钮后放置数据。The default handler for this event cancels the drag-and-drop operation if the ESC key is pressed, and drops the data if the mouse button is released. 如果您处理此事件来更改默认行为，请确保用于提供在处理程序结束拖放操作的等效机制。If you handle this event to change the default behavior, be sure to provide an equivalent mechanism in your handler to end the drag-and-drop operation. 否则为方法不会返回，并且你的应用程序将停止响应。Otherwise, the method will not return and your application will stop responding. 如果您处理此事件，您必须将其标记为已处理以防止重写您的处理程序的默认行为。If you handle this event, you must mark it as handled to prevent the default behavior from overriding your handler. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier Field|| |路由策略Routing Strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .
